item.title: How to merge multiple excel files using python
item.author: luca1iu
item.description: When you have multiple excel files with the same column and you want to merge multiple excel files into one excel fileâ€¦ Python method import packages import pandas as pd import os Put all the excel to be merged into a separate folder define a function def append(path): frames = [] for root, dirs, files in os.walk(path): for file in files: file_with_path = os.path.join(root, file) df = pd.read_excel(file_with_path, engine='openpyxl') frames.append(df) df = pd.
